item.description:
This event is still on!

Meet at the Cape Cod Canal for a bike ride (or walk), followed by a day at the Beach at the end of the Canal.

Bring a picnic lunch, or buy food there at the concession stand.

There are changing rooms, so you don't have to wear your swimming attire while biking.
Don't forget your beach chair, towel, and suntan lotion.

Please wear a helmet and bring water.

I will already be at the Cape, but if you want to carpool with others, say so in the comments section of your RSVP and state where you are coming from.

Meet at Scusset Beach parking lot by the Canal. Parking fee is $10 unless you have a season Mass State Park pass.

Directions:
Scusset Beach State Reservation

Route 495 to Route 25, take exit right before the Bourne Bridge (exit 3-route 6 Bourne) do not go over the Bridge. At Bourne Rotary Cir N, take the 1st exit onto US-6 E heading to Hyannis/Provincetown/RT-3/Plymouth (towards Sagamore).
Continue on Meetinghouse Lane - follow signs to Scusset Beach
Continue on Scusset Beach Rd to the very end where you will enter the State Park and continue to the end/beach parking lot.

http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me with my bike at the beginning of the bike path/Canal. My cell is 508-381-1529.
item.name: Bike (or Walk) and Beach Day
